+def trungbinh(a, b, c):
\ No newline at end of file
+    if (a < b and b < c) or (c < b and b < a):
+        t = b
+    if (b < a and a < c) or (c < a and a < b):
+        t = a
+    if (a < c and c < b) or (b < c and c < a):
+        t = c
+    return t
+
 def inkq(t):
